portabout.para: NetBSD/amigappc is a very experimental port to the PowerPC-based Amiga expansion boards as manufactured by Phase 5.

Supported peripheral devices will basically be the same as with NetBSD/amiga. Currently, we do not plan to create any binary release, but development will continue and is in fact, easier, now that cross-compilation of the base system is supported within NetBSD-current.

portnewsitem.title: first boot into multiuser
portnewsitem.simpara: For the first time an A3000 with Cyberstorm/PPC booted the current powerpc userland from a hard disk connected to the A3000 internal SCSI into multi user mode.
